name: Powershell in Windows Run Keys
description: Adds a RUN key that contains a powershell keyword
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:/[Ss][Ee][Tt][Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee]/ AND registry.path:(/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Rr][Uu][Nn].*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Rr][Uu][Nn][Oo][Nn][Cc][Ee].*/) AND winlog.event_data.Details:(/.*[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*[Ff][Rr][Oo][Mm][Bb][Aa][Ss][Ee]64[Ss][Tt][Rr][Ii][Nn][Gg].*/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\(.*/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd][Ss][Tt][Rr][Ii][Nn][Gg]\(.*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ww]\ [Hh][Ii][Dd][Dd][Ee][Nn]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Pp]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Dd][Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Aa][Nn][Dd]\ .*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:(*\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run* OR *\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\RunOnce*) AND winlog.event_data.Details:(*powershell* OR *FromBase64String* OR *.DownloadFile\(* OR *.DownloadString\(* OR *\ \-w\ hidden\ * OR *\ \-nop\ * OR *\ \-encodedcommand\ *))`
